name: Shotgun Highway
description:
This is a submission for the Black and White Game Jam #8.

If you're playing in the web browser, make sure to FULLSCREEN the web player. Additionally, TAB opens the settings tab on the web player instead of escape.

You have been sent on a mission from HQ to infiltrate a strange structure called the "Highway Loop", and you have been told that everyone on it is a spy. Your mission is to eliminate as many of the "spies" (you're not buying it that they're ALL spies, but oh well, you've gotta do it anyways) as you can, with the occasional help from HQ.
